name: Stickman Master: Archer Legend
description:
【Introduction】
Stickman Master: Archer Legends is a rogue-like stickman shooting & fighting game. The Stickman Kingdom is now suffering from the pollution from evil power. Many stickmen have been turned into the evil puppets. You are the prince of the stickman kingdom and you need to defeat the evil power and save your kingdom. Let's start the fight and defeat the evil powers! Shoot all of your evil enemies and defeat the evil boss!

【How to play】
• Slide the screen to shoot your enemies.
• Control your power and angle to shoot the enemies.
• Combine multiple skills to be stronger.
• Collect new gears to strengthen yourself.
• Upgrade your talents.

【Key Features】
• Easy control & additive gameplay
• Random and stackable skills.
• Many types of equipments with different stats.
• Update talent pool.
• Free rewards every day.
• Lots of enemy types.
